result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ashley Marie Gay

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Ashley M Gay appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Ashley M Gay.  Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Counsel informed Court there has been a breakdown in communication.  Defense motion to withdraw as counsel is granted by the court. Defense counsel will notify Public Defender's Office to appoint new counsel for the defendant.  Case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 01.
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Ashley M Gay appeared by video.  Attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris appeared by video for Ashley M Gay. 
Prosecuting attorney Katrina Voge appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm. 
Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Atty. Harris requests another status date so the defendant can get a TAD evaluation. Case is adjourned to Br. 1. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Ashley M Gay in court with attorney Thomas Evangelos Harris.  
Constatine Siapkaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference held.  Atty. Harris has received discovery but not an offer and would like time to review it with his client.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Attorney Fee Trust - Escrow payment plan created 06/28/22 to repay Milwaukee County $50.00 monthly for attorney fees. First payment commencing 07/01/22.
Appointing Attorney at County Expense, signed and filed.  rmm

Defendant Ashley Marie Gay in court.  
Annie Louk appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Hearing held via Zoom.  Matter set for status conference.  Indigency hearing proceeded.  Court makes a finding that defendant is indigent.  Court appoints Thomas Harris as counsel for defendant at the rate of $100.00 per hour.  Attorney Harris accepts appointment.  Defendant shall reimburse Milwaukee County at the rate of $50.00 on the 1st of every month, commencing 7/01/22 until paid in full. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.  Case is adjourned to Br. 1.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  Status conference scheduled for June 30, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Court ordered no possession or use of any dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with D.T. (dob 5/24/1963) and D.S.T.
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Ashley Marie Gay in court.  Kimberly Dorice Schoepp appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant has lower number case(s) pending.  Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Davila Branch 01.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Davila, Branch 01. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Case is adjourned for a Status Conference in Branch 01.  Status conference scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Ashley Marie Gay
Current: 2939 S Adams Ave #3, Cudahy, WI 53110   (Effective: 05-05-2022)
Prior: 2338 North 15th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 05/05/2022@2:30pm
